document_data.mainbody:
rissen was a halfling member of the Emerald Enclave in the Quivering Forest near Phlan in 1489 DR. 
Grissen was possibly involved in the case of the disappearance of Halvin Graingle and six other villagers of the Kabels Hill community inside the forest. He advised the adventuring party hired to find the missing people to not disturb the elves, who were on good terms with the Enclave.
